about_the_game:
Play as a postman who captures stunning photographs and delivers letters to the warm-hearted residents of Mafate, a remote valley in the heart of an island in the Indian Ocean. Accompanied by Luna, a young Creole girl transformed into a camera, take control of animals to access secret locations and explore this cozy and magical world. Care for the animals, interact with the residents, solve their little troubles, and make your world more vibrant and harmonious.

Stamps of Nature tells the story of Luna, a young Creole girl who, after living her entire life in mainland France, returns to her native island to comfort her grandmother following her grandfather’s death. A disturbing event magically transports her back in time in the form of a camera.

In this soothing game that highlights the heritage of Réunion, the player embodies the Mafate postman, delivering letters and changing the lives of the residents along the way. The photography mechanic allows you to capture life moments and add them to your photo album.

short_description: In MAFATE, play as a mail carrier in the remote Cirque de Mafate in the Indian Ocean. Take photos and deliver letters while exploring this picturesque spot. Help Luna, sent back in time as a camera, touch the locals' lives and uncover the area's charm.
